radirius.merc.utilities.command

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • radirius.merc.utilities.command.Command

  • public abstract class Command
extends Object
    A Command that will do a specific task when asked in the given inputstream (by default, the console).
    Author:
    wessles

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String manual
      The manual that will be shown when requested by the console user.
      String name
      The name of the command.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Command(String name) 
      Command(String name, String manual) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void run(String... args)
      The action to do when the command is run given args.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        public final String name
        The name of the command. This will be case-insensitive.

      • manual

        public final String manual
        The manual that will be shown when requested by the console user. Used for general instruction of using the command.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Command

        public Command(String name,
       String manual)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the command. This will be case-insensitive.
        manual - The manual that will be shown when requested by the console user. Used for general instruction of using the command.

      • Command

        public Command(String name)
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public abstract void run(String... args)
        The action to do when the command is run given args.
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments given for the command. You do not need to use these.
